section.title: RP 32 Part 1
section.paragraph: This problem will help you understand code that creates infinite sequences.

section.title: RP 32 Part 2
section.paragraph: This problem will help you write recursive code to process infinite sequences. To earn credit for it, you must complete this randomized problem correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 33 Part 1
section.paragraph: This problem reviews recursive definitions of sequences. To earn credit for it, you must complete this randomized problem correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 33 Part 2
section.paragraph: This problem deals with one more example of a recursive definition of a sequence.
